package.name: ecommerceoffice_social
package.summary: Social is a powerful but easy to use extensions that helps you simplify your online social life by connecting you to Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, Google+ all in one place.
package.description: Social is also the easiest way to show feed from your social networks - links, images and video
package.notes: 1.0.3 ==== Minor fixes, jQuery caching. 1.0.5 ==== Button layout & default settings fixes 1.0.6 ==== h2 in div tags changing 1.0.7 ==== removed from default product gallery
